---
title: "Machine Learning and Data Science Research"
---

I am an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering](http://www.ece.arizona.edu/) at [The University of Arizona](http://www.arizona.edu/), where I perform research in data mining and applied machine learning. 

My current research interests are in information and coding theory with applications to
* Adversarial Machine Learning: Security, Defenses and Attacks
* Learning from Large Volume Data Streams with Changing Dynamics 
* Applications of Machine Learning: Cybersecurity, Metagenomics, and Medicine
